action.name: Done
action.meta: Production's query is answered.

action.name: Cancel
action.meta: This title will never be ordered.

action.name: Order Correction
action.meta: QA found issues that needs to be fixed by production

action.name: Take to Correction
action.meta: KP takes the correction and enters a new delivery date

action.name: Back to Production
action.meta: File is not ready, needs rework from production.

action.name: Done
action.meta: Correction query is answered.

action.name: Cancel Order
action.meta: Stop order permanently.

action.name: Query for Client
action.meta: KM needs client's feedback on a question raised by KP

action.name: Request Quotation
action.meta: Clients asks for a quotation for an order.

validator.arg: Please make sure there is an input file attached.

action.name: Order Sample
action.meta: For issue-type 'Sample Title' order a free test conversion

validator.arg: Please make sure there is an input file attached.

action.name: Direct Order
action.meta: No preparation by KM, direct order to KP

validator.arg: Please make sure there is an input file attached.

action.name: Order Simple Title
action.meta: Low complexity titles for conversion within 48 hours

validator.arg: Please make sure there is an input file attached.

action.name: Order
action.meta: Quotation is accepted, client gives order for conversion.

action.name: Order Production
action.meta: Konvertus orders the production with a vendor.

action.name: New Quotation
action.meta: Preparation showed issues that require a new quotation.

action.name: Take in Production
action.meta: Queries have been answered, the file is going to be converted

action.name: Reject Production
action.meta: Production requirements not met

action.name: File is Ready
action.meta: Konvertus has ended QA.

action.name: downloaded
action.meta: Client has downloaded the converted file.

action.name: Ask for Information
action.meta: Konvertus needs an information before being able to create a quotation.

action.name: Quotation Created
action.meta: Konvertus added cost information to the order, client gets notified about this quotation.

action.name: File Is Converted
action.meta: Production is finished and title can be checked by Konvertus.

action.name: Query
action.meta: Production asks for information or other input files.

action.name: Query
action.meta: The requested correction is not possible.

action.name: Done
action.meta: Change is done.

action.name: Production Query answered
action.meta: Client has answered KM's production query

action.name: Correction Query Answered
action.meta: Client has answered the correction query to KM

action.name: QA Query Answered
action.meta: Client has answered a QA query of KM

action.name: Rework Question Answered
action.meta: Client answered a rework question of KM

action.name: Back to Correction
action.meta: Take the file back to 'Under Correction' after correction query has been answered

action.name: Back to QA
action.meta: Client has answered the query.

action.name: Back to Rework
action.meta: Take back to rework after clients answer
